channel.description: Recent content in writing on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Write it Out
item.description: You should go read Marc’s write-up of why Wesabe “lost” to Mint †; it’s interesting, insightful, and clearly written.

item.title: Six Word Memoir
item.description: I received an email from my ninth grade English teacher a few days ago.

item.title: Food Blogging: The Dutch Delight
item.description: Since moving to our new neighborhood, I’ve been cooking a lot more, particularly from the church cookbook I grew up with (see also, my post on Sugar Crème Küchen ).

item.title: Meta
item.description: My friend and colleague Vern used to joke that it was more fun to write code to help you write code than it was to actually write code.
